name: Requiro
description:
Welcome to the beautiful world of Requiro!

The village of Chanterville needs your help! A horrible monster is roaming the lands and terrorizing the citizens! 

Play as famous Beast Hunter Thorn Caasberk in this exciting Visual Novel and discover what is going on in Chanterville. Talk to the villagers to get on their friendly side and try to find out every bit of information. Will you be able to defeat the beast at the end of Requiro?

Joke around with the local blacksmith, get into heated debates with the soldier, decipher the crazy words of the druid, compliment the proud mayor of the village or drink a nice, cold beer with the landlady in the tavern!

 

We are Team Agaricus, a group of students, currently pursuing an education at the S4G School for Games. We are four artist and one designer/producer and we hope you'll enjoy our game! Let us know, how you liked it (or if there are any bugs... there are always bugs...)

More info on our homepage!
